verses.roman:
pati-putra-suhṛd-bhrātṛ-
pitṛvan mitravad dharim
ye dhyāyanti sadodyuktās
tebhyo 'pīha namo namaḥ

synonyms: pati—a husband; putra—a son; suhṛt—a friend; bhrātṛ—a brother; pitṛ—a father; vat—like; mitra—an intimate friend; vat—like; harim—on the Supreme Personality of Godhead; ye—all those who; dhyāyanti—meditate; sadā—always; udyuktāḥ—full of eagerness; tebhyaḥ—unto them; api—also; iha—here; namaḥ namaḥ—repeated respectful obeisances.
translation: " 'Let me offer my respectful obeisances again and again to those who always eagerly meditate upon the Supreme Personality of Godhead as a husband, son, friend, brother, father or intimate friend.'

purport.content: This verse appears in the Bhakti-rasāmṛta-sindhu (1.2.308).
